Common.MenuDesc:
Tap on the modules for more information.
Use the menu to see all modules.
Common.MsgNoDataAvailableOfflineMode: Data is not available when offline
Common.MsgNoModuleAvailableOfflineMode: Module is not available when offline
Common.ConfirmExitApp: Are you sure want to exit this app?

Settings.SettingDesc: Configure your preferences from the available options.
Settings.CurrencyDesc: All current and historical share prices, high/low/bid/ask prices will be converted to the currency of your choice.
Settings.CurrencyNote: Financial reporting figures will be presented "AS IS", and will not be converted.
Settings.SeparatorDesc: These settings will be applied to all the numbers throughout the app.
Settings.Copyright: All rights reserved. Unauthorized duplication is a violation of applicable laws.
Settings.AccountNote:
Do you already have MyIRApp login?
Then Sign In.
Settings.AcceptTerms: I accept all terms and conditions
Settings.NotAcceptTerms: Please accept all terms and conditions
Settings.WeWillSendVerification: We will send you a verification email to access your account.
Settings.EnterYourCode: Enter your code below to verify your account.
Settings.InvalidVerificationCode: Invalid verification code. Code must be 6 characters long, and a number.
Settings.PleaseLoginAcc: Please login to use your account.
Settings.EnterYourEmail: Enter your email address and we'll send the verification code.
Settings.UnverifiedMess: Please verify your account to login.
Settings.InvalidPassword: Invalid password. Password must be at least 6 characters long, and contain a number.
Settings.ResetPasswordMess: An email with the password reset link was sent to [email]. Please check your inbox for an email with the subject line "MyIRApp Reset Password".
Settings.QuickMenuNote: Configure the modules you want to see in your launch screen for quick access.
Settings.CustomNote: Tap and drag to arrange your launch screen modules
Settings.SettingGeneralNote: Configure your preferences from the available options.
Settings.CreateAnAccount: Create an account to personalize your app
Settings.TokenExpiredDesc: Your token has expired. Please login again.
Settings.EmailNotFound: Email not found. Please check your email to reset your password.

ShareGraph.ShareDataNote: All share data is presented in currency of your choice. Configure via settings.
ShareGraph.MarketDataNote: All market data is presented in currency of your choice. Configure via settings.
ShareGraph.CompareNote: Tap on the ticker codes below to compare them. We limit the charting to five tickers.

ShareInformation.ShareDataDesc: All share data is presented in currency of your choice. Configure via settings.

Calendar.DownloadDetail: Downloading will add all upcoming events in your device calendar. You can delete them anytime.
Calendar.DownloadOneEventDetail: Downloading will add the event in your device calendar. You can delete it anytime.
Calendar.AddedEventSuccess: Event added to your device calendar
Calendar.AddedAllEventSuccess: Events added to your device calendar
Calendar.TurnOnAccessCalendarMess: Download failed! Please grant access to the Calendar for this App (Go to Settings > Privacy > Calendars)

HistoricalPrice.MsgNoData:
No share-data found for {0}. Maybe the stock exchange was closed at that day.
Please choose another date.

InvestmentCalculator.ErrorSelectDate: Start Date must be smaller than End Date
InvestmentCalculator.IncorrectNumberFormat: Your input is incorrect number format
InvestmentCalculator.Footer: All share data is presented in the currency of your choice. Configure via settings

KeyFinancials.Note: Financial reporting figures will be presented "AS IS", and will not be converted to your currency settings.

Media.DownloadNotification: Downloading will add media to the MyIRApp. You can delete them any time.
